thread.title: BRIEF-Nextedia H1 net result turns to loss of 0.4 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Nextedia H1 net result turns to loss of 0.4 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Nextedia H1 net result turns to loss of 0.4 mln euros
text:
Oct 9 Nextedia SA :
* Reported on Thursday H1 consolidated revenue of 2.5 million euros ($2.8 million) versus 3.7 million euros a year ago
* H1 EBITDA is 0.1 million euros versus 0.1 million euros a year ago
* H1 net loss of 0.4 million euros versus profit of 0.2 million euros
Source text: bit.ly/1G1EcfD Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8862 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
